name: evoke
trans: to cause something to be remembered or expressed

name: image
trans: an idea, esp. a mental picture, of what something or someone is like

name: sway
trans: to move slowly from side to side

name: benefit
trans: a helpful or good effect

name: stereotype
trans: an idea that is used to describe a particular type of person or thing, or a person or thing thought to represent such an idea

name: tradition
trans: a way of behaving or a belief that has been established for a long time, or the practice of following behavior and beliefs that have been so established

name: altar
trans: a type of table used in religious ceremonies

name: ritual
trans: a set of actions or words performed in a regular way, often as part of a religious ceremony

name: evidence
trans: anything that helps to prove that something is or is not true

name: discourage
trans: to cause someone to feel less confident or less hopeful

name: revive
trans: to come back to life, health, existence, or use, or bring something back to such a state

name: reign
trans: to rule a country, or to have power or control

name: celebration
trans: a special social event, such as a party, when you celebrate something

name: influence
trans: to cause someone to change a behavior, belief, or opinion, or to cause something to be changed

name: energetic
trans: very active physically and mentally

name: graceful
trans: moving in a smooth, relaxed, attractive way, or having a smooth, attractive shape

name: elaborate
trans: containing a lot of connected parts or many complicated details

name: floral
trans: made of flowers, or decorated with images of flowers

name: accompany
trans: to go with someone or to exist at the same time as something

name: garland
trans: a circle made of flowers and leaves worn around the neck or head as a decoration
